text: Teaching in Kentucky: My journey from Bronte country to the bluegrass A retired university professor from Yorkshire recalls her years teaching in the Southern USA A signpost on the cobbled streets of Haworth in Yorkshire's BrontÃ« country where Tessa Nelson-Humphries was born. Tessa's literary travels took her far from Yorkshire and around the world as a professor of English Photo: Christopher Furlong/Getty Images By Tessa Nelson-Humphries
